section.title: Important changes
section.para: This release includes fixes for AVETMISS 6.1 reporting. It is recommended for all onCourse users preparing end of year AVETMISS reports as it will reduce the error rate during validation.

listitem.para: Improve calculation of delivery site information, so all virtual sites report the head office/admin site as their training location
Remove possible duplicate entries in the NAT00020 file
Fix a display issue in the Financial Preferences window which prevents the first three choices from being selectable
Fix an issue where certificates that create a record in the NAT00130 file would sometimes not create a corresponding record in the NAT0030 file.
